metadata.title: USN-4662-1 -- OpenSSL vulnerability
metadata.description: David Benjamin discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled comparing certificates containing a EDIPartyName name type. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause OpenSSL to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4662-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcrypto1.1-udeb - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.1 libssl-dev - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.1 openssl - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.1 libssl-doc - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.1 libssl1.1-udeb - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.1 libssl1.1 - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
